text: Selena Gomez is back with Justin Bieber. Plenty of people aren't thrilled with her choice, but her mom Mandy Teefey got so upset that she had a breakdown and was hospitalized over it. Nobody worries like your mom worries, folks. But now, Mandy Teefey is opening up and setting the record straight about some of the wild stories about her feud with Selena. Selena Gomez has been through so, so much. She's waging an uphill battle against Lupus that, at times, seems to rob her of her strength and her ability to live her life.
